peptide.cite: Please cite Norine: a database of nonribosomal peptide, Caboche et Al., Nucleic Acids Research 2008; 36:D326-D331

general.name: atroviridin A
general.comment: They showed antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and phytopathogenic fungi, and exhibited significant cytotoxicity to human cancer cell lines in vitro. Atroviridins showed significant membrane-perturbing activity responsible to their antibiotic action.

structure.composition: Ac-Aib, Pro, Aib, Ala, Aib, Ala, Gln, Aib, Val, Aib, Gly, Leu, Aib, Pro, Val, Aib, Aib, Gln, Gln, Pheol

organism.name: Trichoderma atroviride
organism.taxonomy: cellular organisms, Eukaryota, Fungi, Dikarya, Ascomycota, Pezizomycotina, Sordariomycetes, Hypocreomycetidae, Hypocreales, Hypocreaceae, mitosporic Hypocreaceae, Trichoderma

reference.title: Atroviridins A-C and neoatroviridins A-D, novel peptaibol antibiotics produced by Trichoderma atroviride F80317. I. Taxonomy, fermentation, isolation and biological activities
